name: homeassistant-desktop
description: Desktop App (Windows / macOS / Linux) for Home Assistant built with Electron

scripts.build-local: electron-builder build --mac --win --linux appimage --ia32 --publish never && electron-builder build --linux appimage --x64 --publish never
scripts.deploy: electron-builder build --mac --win --linux appimage --ia32 --publish always && electron-builder build --linux appimage --x64 --publish always

author: Marvin Kelm (https://github.com/mrvnklm)
